import React, { useState } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import Button from './Button' import numberWithCommas from '../utils/numberWithCommas' const ProductView = props => { const product = props.product const [previewImg, setPreviewImg] = useState(product.image01) const [descriptionExpand, setDescriptionExpand] = useState(false) const [color, setColor] = useState(undefined) const [size, setSize] = useState(undefined) const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1) const updateQuantity = (type) => { if (type === 'plus') { setQuantity(quantity + 1) } else { setQuantity(quantity - 1 < 1 ? 1 : quantity - 1) } } return (
setPreviewImg (product.image01)} >
setPreviewImg (product.image02)} >
Product details

{product.title}

{numberWithCommas(product.price)}
Color
{ product.colors.map((item, index) => (
setColor(item)}>
)) }
Size
{ product.size.map((item, index) => (
setSize(item)}> {item}
)) }
Amount
updateQuantitya}>
{quantity}
) } ProductView.propTypes = { product: PropTypes.object.isRequired } export default ProductView
